title: Aveeno Skin Relief Fragrance-Free Body Wash with Triple Oat Formula Soothes Itchy, Dry Skin, Formulated for Sensitive Skin, Fragrance-, Paraben-, Dye- & Soap-Free, 33 fl. Oz
description: Gently cleanse while leaving skin feeling moisturized with Aveeno Skin Relief Fragrance-Free Body Wash. This fragrance-free body wash is made with a soothing Triple Oat formula and formulated for sensitive skin. Aveeno Skin Relief Body Wash gently, but effectively cleanses while leaving itchy, dry skin feeling soothed and moisturized. The soothing Triple Oat formula with oat flour, oat extract and oat oil removes dirt and impurities without disrupting skin's natural moisture barrier. From the dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, this body wash is allergy-tested, free of fragrances, parabens, dyes and soaps, and is suitable for daily use. To Use, squeeze body wash onto a wet pouf, washcloth or hands. Work into a rich, creamy lather, then rinse. Aveeno uses the goodness of nature and the power of science to keep your skin looking healthy and feeling balanced.
